    vs_3_0
    def c22, 0, -1, 256, -32768
    def c23, 16384, 16384, 0.5, 0
    def c24, 8192, 8192, 0, 0
    def c25, 4096, 4096, 0, 0
    def c26, 0, 4096, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_tangent v1
    dcl_normal v2
    dcl_binormal v3
    dcl_texcoord o0.xyz
    dcl_texcoord1 o1.xy
    dcl_texcoord2 o2.xy
    dcl_texcoord4 o3.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5 o4
    dcl_texcoord6 o5
    dcl_texcoord7 o6
    dcl_position o7

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    frc r0.x, v2.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, v2.x
    mova a0.x, r0.x
    rcp r0.x, c22[a0.x].y
    mad r0.y, v0.w, c22.z, v0.z
    add r0.y, r0.y, c22.w
    mul r0.y, r0.y, c18.y
    mul r0.zw, c18.x, v0.xyxy
    mul r1.x, r0.w, c11.z
    mad r1.x, c10.z, r0.z, r1.x
    mad r1.x, c12.z, r0.y, r1.x
    add r1.x, r1.x, c13.z
    mov r2.x, c22[a0.x].x
    mad r1.x, r1.x, c20.x, -r2.x
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.x, r1.x
    add r1.x, -r0.x, -c22.y
    mul r1.yz, r0.x, v3.xxyw
    mad r1.xy, v1, r1.x, r1.yzzw
    mul r1.xy, r1, c18.y
    mov r1.zw, c22_abs.xyyx
    nrm r2.xyz, r1.zwxw
    nrm r3.xyz, r1.wzyw
    mul r1, r0.w, c7
    mad r1, c6, r0.z, r1
    mad r0.zw, r0, c16.xyxy, c16.xywz
    mad o2.xy, r0.zwzw, c15, c15.wzzw
    mad r0.z, v2.w, c22.z, v2.z
    add r0.z, r0.z, c22.w
    mul r0.w, r0.z, c18.y
    mad r0.z, r0.z, c18.y, -r0.y
    mad r4.z, r0.z, r0.x, r0.y
    lrp r2.w, r0.x, r0.w, r0.y
    mad r0, c8, r2.w, r1
    add r0, r0, c9
    add r1.xyz, -r0, c21
    mul r5.xy, r1, c18.zwzw
    mov r5.z, r1.z
    mul o4.xyz, r1, c21.w
    dp3 r1.x, r5, c6
    dp3 r1.y, r5, c7
    dp3 r1.z, r5, c8
    dp3 o3.x, r2, r1
    dp3 o3.y, r3, r1
    mul r5.xyz, r2.zxyw, r3.yzxw
    mad r5.xyz, r2.yzxw, r3.zxyw, -r5
    dp3 o3.z, r5, r1
    mov r1.x, c18.x
    mad r4.xy, v0, r1.x, c19.zwzw
    add o0.xyz, r4, c17
    add r1.xy, r4, c23.z
    mul o1.xy, r1, c19
    mad r1.xyz, r0, -c4.w, c4
    mul r1.xy, r1, c18.zwzw
    dp3 r4.x, r1, c6
    dp3 r4.y, r1, c7
    dp3 r4.z, r1, c8
    dp3 o5.x, r2, r4
    dp3 o5.y, r3, r4
    dp3 o5.z, r5, r4
    mov o4.w, c22.x
    mov o5.w, -c22.y
    mul r1, r0.y, c1
    mad r1, c0, r0.x, r1
    mad r1, c2, r0.z, r1
    mad r0, c3, r0.w, r1
    mul r1.x, r0.w, c14.z
    mad r0.xy, r1.x, c14, r0

// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-vertex-halo --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-vs=s3 7E53C183.txt

add r31.w, r0.w, -r31.y
mad r0.x, r31.w, r31.x, r0.x

    mov o6, r0
